casebody.data:
In the Matter of Travis Ray BUTTS. No. 296A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 30, 2003. Laura E. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, for State. Marjorie S. Canaday, Blowing Rock, for Butts. Seth Jaffe, Raleigh, for ACLU of NC Legal Foundation, Inc.

Motion by ACLU of NC Legal Foundation, Inc. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief has been filed and the following order entered:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of December 2003."
